function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal protective equipment and professional training for family members leading to familial cluster infections.","Impact":"Increased risk of familial cluster infections and spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Providing education and resources for family members on proper infection control measures and personal protective equipment.","Technologies":"Training programs, instructional materials, and access to personal protective equipment.","People":"Family members of individuals with suspected COVID-19 infections.","Owner":"Public health authorities and community organizations."},{"Description":"Widespread contamination of air and object surfaces in COVID-19 wards by SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated transmission of COVID-19 and potential spread to other patients and healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and improved ventilation systems in healthcare facilities.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, improved air filtration systems, and robotic cleaning devices.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients in healthcare facilities, and visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management and government health agencies."},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the minimal infectious dose and aerosol transmission distance of SARS-CoV-2.","Impact":"Challenges in determining effective infection control measures and transmission prevention strategies.","Mitigation":"Continued research to better understand the transmission characteristics of SARS-CoV-2, development of evidence-based guidelines for infection control, and implementation of precautionary measures.","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods, data analysis tools, and real-time monitoring systems for infectious disease transmission.","People":"Public health researchers, medical professionals, and policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and government research funding bodies."}]}
